title: Profielinstellingen telkens corrupt
content:
Het gebeurt vrijwel iedere keer als ik mijn Windows 11 laptop opstart dat ik niet mijn gebruikelijke startscherm krijg maar het scherm als in bijlage 1. Vervolgens moet ik dan de probleemoplossing aanzetten omdat er geen site geladen kan worden (bolletjes in de tabs blijven heen en weer gaan maar site wordt niet geladen, bijlage 2) Vervolgens komt vaak het scherm in bijlage 3. Als ik dan de probleemoplossing weer uitzet en opnieuw Firefox opstart moet ik mijn werkbalk weer aanvullen met de button bladwijzers en startscherm weer aanpassen naar mijn eigen voorkeur.

Een tijdje geleden was er ook vaak een nieuw profiel aangemaakt maar ik heb alle oude profielen opgeruimd. Is helaas geen afdoende oplossing.

Wat verder nog van belang is dat ik Bitdefender gebruik en NordVPN en NordPass.

De problemen zijn er pas een paar maanden, daarvoor werkte alles feilloos. Ik gebruik Firefox en Thundebird al vele jaren. Ook met Thunderbird heb ik problemen maar daarvoor maak ik een aparte melding voor.

title: Browser doesn't react to clicks on certain sites..
content:
I updated Firefox to version 138 yesterday. I use Linux Ubuntu.

Now, this has occurred to me twice. Browser stops reacting to mouse clicks on certain sites(Noble Horse Champion, Flight Rising) after hours of browsing and I have to use right-click to navigate on those sites.... until I restart browser. I tried to close tab and refresh tab when these problems occurred.

I think this is clearly browser problem(because clicked areas are on browser, not tabs), not problem in sites itself, because problem manifested itself after hours of browsing, not immediately.
creator: yatski

title: Firefox does not ask me where I want to save my downloads.
content: I have my Firefox browser set to ask me where I would like to save my downloads. However, it never asks me. It just automatically sends everything to my downloads folder then opens the file in a new window. I then have to go into my downloads folder and save it where I want to save it. So I must go through the saving process twice. Given that I download a lot of files for my business, this gets real old real quick. I don't have this problem with Chrome. I would like to stick with Firefox, but I'm going to have to make a change if I can't get this issue fixes.

title: Tab Groups and Homepage Startup
content:
Is there a way to have selected tab groups open as part of your homepage start up? I currently have my homepage set with a number of custom urls.

For example - https://www.amazon.com|https://www.ebay.com|https://www.weather.com

I would like to combine the first 2 into a tab group named "shopping" and when I open firefox fresh I would like to see the collapsed shopping group and the weather tab.

I tried to set this up then pressed the "Use Current Pages" in settings, but all it did was remove tabs that I had placed in the tab group, so when I opened firefox, they just weren't there. I was able to use the down arrow on the tab bar to find my group and open it, but I would just rather see it on startup instead of having to go look for it.

Thanks in advance for any help or suggestions.

content:
Hi all,

I'm an English speaker in Germany, and I'm trying to add amazon.de as a search shortcut, using the official steps (right click on address bar, choose 'add Amazon').

However, I'm getting the following error: Firefox could not download the search plugin from: https://d2lo25i6d3q8zm.cloudfront.net/browser-plugins/AmazonSearchSuggestionsOSD.Firefox.xml

I've seen similar calls for help that seem to stretch back years, but alas they appear to have had slightly different symptoms/solutions that don't seem to apply to my situation.

Cheers.

title: Mozilla apps don't print on Arch Linux laptop, not even to pdf
content: I have an Arch Linux installation with Plasma desktop. Software is always kept up-to-date. Sometime recently, Mozilla apps, Firefox nor Thunderbird, will no longer print, neither to pdf nor to network printer. These always worked before. Now, if even "print preview" is invoked, the dialog opens as a blank sub window with only the word "Print" in upper right, and at left center is "Preparing Preview with rotating time delay wheel, which never resolves. All other apps, including other browsers and mail handlers, will print without issue. I've tried the obvious checks with no success. Where could be the problem? Is there a helper app shared by Firefox and Thunderbird that could be the issue? The only potential remedy I have not yet tried is complete removal of both Firefox and Thunderbird, as that would cause re-configuration issues for both. It's necessary to press <ESC> to terminate the print window when it fails to respond. Screenshot attached...
creator: mozilla387

title: Lagging Issues While Playing Krunker.io on Firefox – Any Fixes?
content:
Hi everyone,

I’ve recently started playing Krunker.io (a browser-based FPS game), but I’m facing a lot of lag and stuttering in Firefox. The game runs fine for a few minutes and then randomly starts slowing down — especially during fast action scenes.

I’ve tried the basic stuff like:

Updating Firefox

Using private window mode

Closing other tabs

Enabling hardware acceleration

But the issue still comes back, especially when I play for more than 10–15 minutes. Has anyone else experienced this with browser games on Firefox? Any tweaks or settings you recommend to improve performance?

Thanks in advance! 😊

title: Enhanced Tracking Protection Exceptions do no work in Private windows
content:
As the title suggests, I've found that exceptions added for 'Enhanced Tracking Protection' simply do not function in a private window; they're entirely ignored. The discovered 'Tracking Content' (from shield in the address bar) will list the exact domain that's whitelisted and the network tab of the devtools will label the URL as blocked due to tracking content. Obviously this is wrong, that short of per-window type settings, this should be global (and makes no sense to differentiate anyhow).

Switching to a standard window fixes this, however, and the exceptions are taken into account.
creator: thunfremlinc
